snippet: Rocco Scuiletti was charged with leaving the scene of an accident after Ms. Kennedy swerved into his truck in July.
abstract: Rocco Scuiletti, the driver of a tractor-trailer who was involved in an accident with a car driven by Kerry Kennedy in Westchester County in July, pleads not guilty to leaving the scene of an accident and vows to fight the charge.
lead_paragraph: Rocco Scuiletti was charged with leaving the scene of an accident after Ms. Kennedy swerved into his truck in July.

headline.seo: Truck Driver in Kerry Kennedy Crash Pleads Not Guilty
headline.main: Truck Driver in Kerry Kennedy Crash Pleads Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Trucker in Kennedy Crash Plans to Fight Charge
